Posts.Title: Had the biopsies -- now the wait tooz61 Beesie

Posts.Content: tooz61 wrote: And I'm damned near a basket case.  I had 2 biopsies this morning.  One for microcalcifications (stereotactic) and an ultra sound biopsy for a mass.  It went ok.  Now in less than 48 hours I should know the results.  And I'm just terrified.  I had DCIS last year so I am at a higher risk for bc.  The biopsy was done on the *other* breast.  I am just praying it isn't bc again and that both are benign.  Any prayers or messages of hope welcome. Posts.Title: Had the biopsies -- now the wait tooz61 Beesie

Posts.Content: Oct 22, 2008 10:25AM tooz61 wrote: I have been on tamoxifen for almost year now.  That worries me because if it is bc, it means the tamox didn't work.  I guess this is in G*d's hands now.  Thank you for all of your prayers and good wishes.
